# API Documentation

This directory contains auto-generated API documentation built by Doxygen.

## ðŸ”„ Auto-Generated Content

**WARNING:** All files in this directory (except `.gitkeep` and this `README.md`) are automatically generated by the Doxygen CI workflow. **Do not manually edit HTML files** - they will be overwritten on the next release.

## ðŸ“š Viewing Documentation

### Online (GitHub Pages)
The latest API documentation is published at:
- **GitHub Pages URL:** `https://<owner>.github.io/<repo>/api/`

Documentation is automatically updated when new version tags are pushed (e.g., `v0.1.0`, `v1.0.0`).

### Local Generation
To generate documentation locally:

```bash
# From project root
doxygen Doxyfile

# View output
open build/docs/html/index.html  # macOS
xdg-open build/docs/html/index.html  # Linux
```

## ðŸ”¨ Build Process

1. Developer pushes a version tag: `git tag v0.1.0 && git push origin v0.1.0`
2. GitHub Actions workflow `.github/workflows/doxygen-pages.yml` triggers
3. Doxygen generates HTML documentation
4. Generated docs are committed to `docs/api/` on the `main` branch
5. GitHub Pages automatically deploys from the `docs/` folder

## ðŸ“– Documentation Standards

For guidelines on writing Doxygen comments in code, see:
- **[docs/DOXYGEN_GUIDE.md](../DOXYGEN_GUIDE.md)** - Complete contributor guide
- **[CLAUDE.md](../../CLAUDE.md)** - Project coding standards
